title: fix: align gemini-search registry with actual model
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Flash sale on knowledge
gist.blurb: We've updated our star charts! Gemini Search is now officially powered by Flash Lite, bringing you faster answers at a fraction of the pollen cost.
gist.summary: Corrected the gemini-search registry metadata to reflect the actual underlying model (Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite) and updated pricing to match.
gist.impact: Users will see accurate model information and significantly reduced costs for search queries (dropping to $0.10/$0.40 per million tokens).
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee mascot in a cozy pixel art observatory or shop, updating a price tag on a glowing telescope or crystal ball. The telescope represents the 'search' capability (looking for answers). The price tag update represents the cost reduction. The 'Flash' aspect can be hinted at with a lightning bolt motif on the telescope.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot adjusting a price tag on a glowing digital telescope. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. The telescope points to a constellation shaped like a twin star. Pixel text on tag: 'SALE'. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee adjusting a price tag on a glowing digital crystal. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Tiny bee character with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text reading 'UPDATED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
